description: Numbers n such that string 4,4 occurs in the base 6 representation of n but not of n+1.
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n,6],{4,4}]>0,1,0],{n,1600}],{1,0}]][[1]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 20 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
